dts_vmss_rule: EC2 VPC Peering should not have cross account connection
dts_wiz_rule: VPC peering communication should be only between AWS VPCs who are members of the same AWS account

dts_vmss_rule: SNS topic should have encryption enabled
dts_wiz_rule: SNS Topic Server-Side Encryption (SSE) should be enabled

dts_vmss_rule: EC2 VPC default security group should restrict all access
dts_wiz_rule: Default Security Group attached to a VPC should not allow all traffic

dts_vmss_rule: EC2 instance should be configured to use IMDSv2
dts_wiz_rule: EC2 instance should use instance metadata service v2 (IMDSv2) / EC2 instance should use IMDSv2

dts_vmss_rule: ACM should not have certificates that are expired or expiring in the next 30 days
dts_wiz_rule: ACM certificate expires within 30 days

dts_vmss_rule: Elastic Load Balancer should have one or more listeners configured
dts_wiz_rule: Elastic Load Balancer should use SSL listeners

dts_vmss_rule: WAFv2 web ACL should be associated with a resource
dts_wiz_rule: Not present in WIZ

dts_vmss_rule: CloudWatch monitoring should be configured for any changes in AWS organizations
dts_wiz_rule: CloudWatch Alarm should monitor AWS Organization(We have mutiple controls in WIZ for cloud watch Alarm)

dts_vmss_rule: WAFv2 web ACL should have rules defined
dts_wiz_rule: WAF Web ACL default action is set to allow requests that do not match any rules

dts_vmss_rule: CloudFront distribution field-level encryption should be enabled
dts_wiz_rule: CloudFront encrypted data in transit should use TLS version 1.2 or higher

dts_vmss_rule: Route53 hosted zone records should be configured with health check
dts_wiz_rule: Not present in WIZ

dts_vmss_rule: CloudFront distribution should be attached to WAF
dts_wiz_rule: CloudFront distribution should be associated with a WAF web ACL

dts_vmss_rule: EC2 security group should restrict public access
dts_wiz_rule: EC2 Security Group should restrict uncommon ports access

dts_vmss_rule: CloudFront distribution access logging should be enabled
dts_wiz_rule: CloudFront distribution logging should be enabled

dts_vmss_rule: Classic Load Balancer should have access logs enabled
dts_wiz_rule: Classic Load Balancer access logging should be enabled

dts_vmss_rule: EC2 security group should restrict public access to FTP control port (21)
dts_wiz_rule: EC2 Security Group should restrict FTP access (TCP:21)

dts_vmss_rule: CloudTrail S3 bucket should have access logging enabled
dts_wiz_rule: S3 Bucket containing CloudTrail log files should have logging enabled / CloudTrail S3 Bucket has logging disabled

dts_vmss_rule: Elastic Load Balancer should not have invalid HTTP headers
dts_wiz_rule: Application Load Balancer should drop invalid headers

dts_vmss_rule: EKS cluster should restrict public access
dts_wiz_rule: EKS Cluster endpoint public access should be disabled

dts_vmss_rule: ACM should not have a certificate with a wildcard domain
dts_wiz_rule: ACM certificate domain name should not contain a wildcard

dts_vmss_rule: EC2 security group should restrict public access over IPv4 to SSH port (22)
dts_wiz_rule: EC2 Security Group should restrict SSH access (TCP:22)

dts_vmss_rule: EKS control plane should have controller manager logging enabled
dts_wiz_rule: EKS Cluster control plane logging should be enabled for all logging types

dts_vmss_rule: OpenSearch application logging should be enabled
dts_wiz_rule: OpenSearch (ElasticSearch) domain logs should be enabled

dts_vmss_rule: Classic Load Balancer should have cross-zone load balancing enabled
dts_wiz_rule: Classic Load Balancer cross-zone load balancing should be enabled

dts_vmss_rule: EKS control plane should have scheduler logging enabled
dts_wiz_rule: EKS Cluster control plane logging should be enabled for all logging types

dts_vmss_rule: OpenSearch search slow logging should be enabled
dts_wiz_rule: OpenSearch (ElasticSearch) domain search slow logs should be enabled

dts_vmss_rule: OpenSearch index slow logging should be enabled
dts_wiz_rule: OpenSearch (ElasticSearch) domain index slow logs should be enabled

dts_vmss_rule: OpenSearch service domain should restrict public access
dts_wiz_rule: OpenSearch (ElasticSearch) domain should not be publicly accessible

dts_vmss_rule: EKS control plane should have authenticator logging enabled
dts_wiz_rule: EKS Cluster control plane logging should be enabled for all logging types

dts_vmss_rule: OpenSearch policy should not allow unrestricted access for all users
dts_wiz_rule: OpenSearch (ElasticSearch) domain policy should not be overly permissive

dts_vmss_rule: EKS control plane should have audit logging enabled
dts_wiz_rule: EKS Cluster control plane logging should be enabled for all logging types

dts_vmss_rule: EKS control plane should have API logging enabled
dts_wiz_rule: EKS Cluster control plane logging should be enabled for all logging types

dts_vmss_rule: EKS security group should restrict incoming traffic from ports other than TCP port 443
EKS node group should use matching Amazon Machine Image and Kubernetes release versions
EC2 instance should not use default VPC
dts_wiz_rule: EC2 instance should not use the default VPC

dts_vmss_rule: CloudTrail log file should be encrypted
dts_wiz_rule: CloudTrail logs should be encrypted with SSE-KMS

dts_vmss_rule: EC2 instance should not have a public IP address
dts_wiz_rule: EC2 instance should not have a public IP address

dts_vmss_rule: KMS service should be enabled
dts_wiz_rule: Not present in WIZ

dts_vmss_rule: Route53 hosted zone should contain a TXT record
dts_wiz_rule: Not present in WIZ

dts_vmss_rule: SNS topic policy should restrict access to required users
dts_wiz_rule: SNS Topic policy should not allow all principals
